tool_description: Refines and enhances email text for professional clarity, conciseness, and impact while maintaining the original message intent.

draft_text.description: Original email draft text to enhance

enhancement_focus.description: Primary enhancement focus: clarity, conciseness, persuasiveness, diplomacy

preserve_tone.description: Whether to preserve the original tone

word_limit.description: Target word limit for the enhanced text

error_messages: Empty draft text: Provide email content to enhance
Invalid enhancement focus: Use one of [clarity, conciseness, persuasiveness, diplomacy]
Word limit too restrictive: Minimum 20 words required for coherent communication
Text too long: Maximum 1000 words supported for enhancement
usage: Input the draft_text and specify enhancement_focus, preserve_tone preferences, and optional word_limit. The tool returns improved text with specific enhancements highlighted.

enhanced_text.description: Professionally enhanced version of the original text

word_count.description: Final word count of enhanced text
